sentences: Co-Chairs Guthrie and Jallow convened the first contact group on the fourth review of the UNFCCC financial mechanism and the GEF.
Guthrie reported that the G-77/China had prepared elements of a draft decision on additional guidelines for the review.

The text sets out objectives, including an examination of all sources and means of financing to assist developing countries to contribute to the achievement of the Convention objective, and the development of options for innovative financing.
The EU favored launching a call for submissions to inform deliberations at SBI 28.
Co-Chair Guthrie queried the timeliness of parties deliberations for input to GEF replenishment negotiations commencing in 2009.
Informal consultations will be held Friday.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
